roleset.name: talk badly about someone, denigrate
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01 Task 3. Framed by Claire.

example.name: All arguments, invented
example.text: John slagged Mary for wearing last year's pumps.
example.note: references say that "slag" exists in addition to "slag off", but I could only find usage examples for "slag off".

example.text: It is important to seperate the innocent from the guilty in both industries but it 's ironic that the papers have been selling copy by basically tarring all bankers with the same brush and slagging them off mercilessly for years .
